alert.note: Alert for Big Island South; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 06 at 3:38AM HST until January 07 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF MOLOKAI NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY CANCELLED FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND AND WINDWARD OAHU... .A large northwest swell will generate warning or advisory level surf along most north and west facing shores through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Surf will be 8 to 11 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
